meanings.definition: Incorrect interpretation or understanding of something.
meanings.sent1: The misconstruction of the map led us in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent2: The misconstruction of the instructions caused confusion among the students.
meanings.sent3: The misconstruction of the joke made everyone laugh at the wrong moment.
meanings.sent4: His misconstruction of her intentions left him feeling lost and alone.
meanings.sent5: The misconstruction of the concept made it difficult for the students to grasp.

meanings.definition: A mistake in the way something is built or put together.
meanings.sent1: The misconstruction of the toy made it fall apart easily.
meanings.sent2: The misconstruction of the bridge led to its collapse.
meanings.sent3: The misconstruction of the puzzle made it impossible to solve.
meanings.sent4: The misconstruction of the chair caused it to wobble uncomfortably.
meanings.sent5: The misconstruction of the building resulted in structural issues.
